name: Tortellini Skewers
description: These tortellini Skewers made with fresh mozzarella, cherry tomatoes,and cheese tortellini are served with a cheesy pesto sauce.

name: Fried Ravioli
description: These fried ravioli are cheese ravioli coated in seasoned breadcrumbs, then fried to golden brown perfection.

name: Wild Mushroom Arancini
description: Arancini, which means “little orange” in Italian, is a rice ball stuffed with cheese or meat that’s coated in breadcrumbs and then fried.

name: Roast Stuffed Chicken
description: The chicken is coated with some butter and seasonings and then roasted to perfection with the savory stuffing. The stuffing is a simple, fresh breadcrumb mixture.

name: Chicken & Mushroom Pasta
description: Seared chicken strips are mixed through a super creamy pasta, cooked in the one pot with white wine, garlic, mushrooms and parmesan cheese.

name: Beef Lasagne
description: Red wine and caster sugar are the secret ingredients in the mince that will make everyone keep asking for more.

name: Chicken Goujons
description: Chicken Goujons are prepared by coating chicken meat in a breading mixture and then deep frying them, in a manner similar to the preparation of schnitzel.

name: Sesame-Ginger Beef
description: Sesame Ginger Beef is a simple stir fry of Beef with ginger and sesame seeds mixed with green beans then flavoured with soy sauce, sugar and sesame oil.

name: Crispy Fried Chicken
description: The chicken is fried in such a way that the skin is extremely crunchy, but the white meat is relatively soft.

name: Mongolian Shrimp & Broccoli
description: Mongolian shrimp is a Chinese dish that is both spicy and sweet. The shrimp can either be stir-fried in the pan or cooked in the deep fryer.

name: Spicy Coconut Salmon
description: Served with warm spicy coconut milk sauce and top with red pepper flakes and cilantro.

name: Chocolate Mud Cake
description: This stunning chocolate cake with creamy ganache topping.

name: Bourbon-Pecan Tart
description: Gooey and sticky sweet, pecan pie is the quintessential Southern dessert.

name: Texas Sheet Cake
description: Made of two of Texans' favorite ingredients: buttermilk and pecans.
